event.title: Protecting your innovations, CeBIT, Hanover, Germany
event.body: The question if and how to protect innovations is crucial for many individuals and businesses. FSFE's Vice President Matthias Kirschner attends a panel discussion which discusses several ways how to approach this aim. The topics range between copyright methods, software patents, and their implications for Free Software. The event takes place in hall 8 from 16:30 until 17:15 and is in English.
